To preview the HTML file stored in the JCR, you do not need to open an additional browser window. With the eXo IDE, you just click *Show Preview* button on the _Toolbar_, or go to *Run > Show Preview* on the top menu after opening the HTML file in the _Content Panel_. The content of HTML file will be opened as a webpage in the IFRAME of _Preview Tab_.
{note}
* You cannot view created and non-saved files only.
* Unsaved changes will not be displayed when you edit the HTML file.
{note}
